title: Social Studies Instructional Design Through Online Small-Group Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and experience in social studies education
context.additional_context: Conducted in a BYOD environment, with weekly offline meetings (once) and online collaboration (three times) per week

learning_goals: Learners can establish small-group project plans using online collaboration tools (e.g., Padlet, Google Docs).
Through role division, learners conduct peer evaluation and feedback to derive solutions for social studies problems.
Learners can complete collaborative learning outcomes by participating in three or more asynchronous discussions in a blended environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
